cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.controller

Class PatientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.controller.PatientController

  • public class PatientController
extends java.lang.Object

    Description:
    The controller for all changes made to a Patient. This is used by the gui to change Patient information in the model.

    Issues:
    None.

    See Also:
    Patient

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PatientController(android.content.Context ctx)
      Constructs the Patient controller with the provided application context used to create the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void addProblem(Patient patient, Problem newProblem)
      The controller method for the gui to request a problem be added to the patient's recorded problems.
      void deleteProblem(Patient patient, Problem problem)
      The controller method for the gui to request that one of the Patient's problems is deleted.
      Database getDatabase() 
      void setBodyPhotos(Patient patient, java.util.ArrayList<Photo> newPhotos)
      The controller method for the gui to set Body Photos for the Patient.
      void setEmail(Patient patient, java.lang.String newEmail)
      The controller method for the gui to request that the given patient's email is changed.
      void setPhoneNumber(Patient patient, java.lang.String newPhoneNumber)
      The controller method for the gui to request that the given patient's phone number is changed.

      • addProblem

        public void addProblem(Patient patient,
                       Problem newProblem)
        The controller method for the gui to request a problem be added to the patient's recorded problems.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient who is having another problem added.
        newProblem - The new problem which is added.

        problem - The problem which is to be deleted.
